bot_config {"Clock": "mock"}

join hortbot 999 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :Wowee
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!autoreply add *who_is_zik* Nobody important.
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Autoreply #1 added.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :Who is Zik?
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Nobody important.


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!autoreply add REGEX:(^|\b)wowee($|\b) Wowee
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Autoreply #2 added.

#handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!autoreply list
#send hortbot #foobar [HB] Autoreplies: 1: ^who is zik$ -> Nobody important. ; 2: ^.*what game.*$ -> Garry's Mod!


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :Wowee
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Wowee

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :Wowee
no_send

clock_forward 20s

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :Wowee
no_send

clock_forward 20s

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :Wowee
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Wowee


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :Nothing.
no_send
